meanings.definition: The act of speaking words for someone else to write down.
meanings.sent1: During the dictation, the teacher read the story out loud for us to write.
meanings.sent2: The secretary took dictation from the boss to type up the meeting notes.
meanings.sent3: In a dictation exercise, the students giggled as they tried to write down the words accurately.
meanings.sent4: Her dictation of the poem was so clear, it felt like the words were writing themselves.
meanings.sent5: The dictation of the instructions made it easy for everyone to follow along.
